TunableTuple.name: BALLOON_DATA
TunableTuple.description: Information that will be used to create a balloon when a sentiment gets added to a sim.

Tunable.name: balloon_stack_window_seconds
Tunable.description: The delay in seconds that a sentiment bubble should wait and see if similar sentiments on the same sim is triggered (generally towards multiple other sims). If similar sentiments are detected within the time window, they will be condensed into a "multi-sentiment" visual treatment. Numbers are in sim seconds

TunableEnum.name: balloon_type
TunableEnum.description: The visual style of the balloon background.

TunableTuple.name: balloon_view_offset
TunableTuple.description: The Vector3 offset from the balloon bone to the thought balloon.

Tunable.name: duration
Tunable.description: The duration, in seconds, that a balloon should last.

TunableVariant.name: icon
TunableVariant.description: The Icon that will be showed within the balloon.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the lifestyle brand we want to use.

TunableTuple.name: participant
TunableTuple.description: The Sim who's thumbnail will be used.

TunableTuple.name: privacy
TunableTuple.description: Search an interaction's privacy liability to find violating Sims and randomly select one to display an icon of.

TunableTuple.name: resource_key
TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: We use this participant's holiday tracker to get the icon.

Tunable.name: multi_sim_icon
Tunable.description: The Icon that will be showed within the balloon for sentiments towards multiple sims.

Tunable.name: overlay
Tunable.description: The overlay for the balloon, if present.

Tunable.name: LONG_TERM_VALUE_ADJUSTMENT
Tunable.description: When failing to add a positive long-term SentimentTrack. This will be a whole number value added to the negative long term SentimentTrack value.

Tunable.name: NEGATIVE_LONG_TERM_VALUE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: The SentimentTrack value below which a positive long-term SentimentTrack can replace a negative long-term SentimentTrack

Tunable.name: NEGATIVE_SHORT_TERM_VALUE_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: SentimentTrack value below which a positive short-term SentimentTrack can replace all negative short-term SentimentTracks

Tunable.name: PROXIMITY_LOOT_COOLDOWN
Tunable.description: The number of seconds until a sim is allowed to attempt to roll to get a buff from a SentimentTrack that they have towards a specific sim.

TunableTuple.name: PROXIMITY_NO_LOOT_CHANCE_WEIGHT
TunableTuple.description: The weighted chance that a sim may roll to not get a loot when coming in proximity of a sim that they have a sentiment towards.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

Tunable.name: SENTIMENT_CAP
Tunable.description: Maximum amount of sentiments that one sim can have towards another individual sim. If someone wants to make this a value higher than 4, please sync up with a GPE lead first.

Tunable.name: SHORT_TERM_VALUE_ADJUSTMENT
Tunable.description: When failing to add a positive short-term SentimentTrack. This will be a whole number value added to the existing negative short term SentimentTrack values.
